General.description: A well-rounded character with balanced offense and defense.

Sparking.description: Sparking strategy focuses on aggressive damage output.

Fusion.description: Fusion strategy emphasizes combining units to increase synergy.

Survivability.description: Survivability strategy focuses on countering and preventing your oponent from entering sparking mode
